original_text: In their setting of their threshold by my thresholds, and their post by my posts, and the wall between me and them, they have even defiled my holy name by their abominations that they have committed: wherefore I have consumed them in mine anger.
korean_text: 그들이 그 문지방을 내 문지방 곁에 두며 그 문설주를 내 문설주 곁에 두어서 그들과 나 사이에 겨우 한 담이 막히게 하였고 또 그 행하는 가증한 일로 내 거룩한 이름을 더럽혔으므로 내가 노하여 멸망시켰거니와

sentences.original_text: In their setting of their threshold by my thresholds
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 문턱 곧에 자기들의 문턱을 두고

sentences.original_text: and their post by my posts
sentences.korean_translation: 자기들의 기둥을 내 기둥 곁에 두며

sentences.original_text: and wall between me and them
they have even defiled my holy name
by their abominations that they have committed
wherefore I have consumed them in mine anger
